li.label: flirty
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is always ready with a flirtatious comment or a playful compliment, lifting the spirits of those around {PAWN_objective}. {PAWN_pronoun} has a knack for making others feel special and desired, however this may sometimes lead to complicated situations when {PAWN_pronoun}'s playful intentions are misinterpreted.
